alert.note: Alert for Clackamas (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 02 at 8:01PM PDT until September 02 at 8:30PM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Portland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Clackamas County in northwestern Oregon... * Until 830 PM PDT. * At 801 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 12 miles west of Bagby Hot Springs, or 20 miles northwest of Detroit, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Molalla and Colton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail, damaging wind, and frequent cloud to ground lightning are occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
